item.title: Easy Steps To Create Log4j2 Rolling File For Spring Boot
item.description: Introduction Spring Boot applications can save informative messages or application errors to a file. This functionality allows you to monitor the application’s health and take necessary action when problems arise. Logging all of this information to a single file, on the other hand, will cause the file to expand in size, which would be a nightmare if the file size rose to MB or GB and you wanted to trace a specific exception throughout the whole log file.

item.title: Two Steps To Add Log4j2 To Spring Boot Application
item.description: Introduction Log4j2 is a comprehensive and modern framework for logging messages in applications.
